title: The standard model in noncommutative geometry and fermion doubling
abstract: The link between chirality in the fermion sector and (anti-)self-duality in the boson sector is reexamined in the light of Connes' noncommutative geometry approach to the Standard Model. We find it to impose that the noncommutative Yang-Mills action be symmetrized in an analogous way to the Dirac-Yukawa operator itself.
